item.title: Build a micro ORM in Golang
item.description:
The problem of ORM library

Writing a data access layer is boring for developer who is not familiar with SQL and the Paradox of Choice with ORM libraries. Many developers usually use a common ORM library on Github and might end up with unexpected behaviors because some features in the library do over-engineering their requirements.

item.title: Update all docker images
item.description: Docker does not have a command to update your images to latest version that you have already pulled in your system by default. Sometimes, we want to update image to latest version because of bugs or vulnerabilities. This action is similar to apt update && apt upgrade in debian-based system.

item.title: Install packages offline on RHEL-based distribution
item.description: Some of my customers have policies to install packages in offline environment. This article summarized useful commands for working with RHEL server.
